mapper.select: SELECT c.id FROM university u LEFT JOIN city c ON u.city_id = c.id LEFT JOIN province p ON c.province_id = p.id LEFT JOIN major m ON u.code = m.university_code LEFT JOIN admit a ON m.id = a.major_id GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY SUM(a.plan) DESC
SELECT c.id, c.name, c.province_id, p.name provinceName FROM city c LEFT JOIN province p ON c.province_id = p.id WHERE c.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
